use.flag: Administrative utilities like smv and reset-tpm-enrollments
Desktop utilities like umpv and mpv-sbs
Git utilities like git-open and merge-dependabot-prs
Media utilities like wait-for-disc and add-info-json
Miscellaneous utilities like gogextract and adp
String utilities like is-ascii and ucwords
Utilities for Wine like mkwineprefix and wineshell
Internet-related utilities like where-from and chrome-bisect-flags
